vote.title: ELECTION OF PRESIDENT PRO TEM OF COUNCIL
vote.description:
President Hardin assumed the chair, and opened the floor for nominations for President Pro Tem of Council. Councilmember Barroso de Padilla motioned that Council Member Elizabeth Brown be appointed President Pro Tem of Columbus City Council.  

Council President asked if there were any other nominations for President Pro Tem of City Council.   Hearing none, the floor was closed for nominations.  

Roll call by voice on the nomination of Elizabeth Brown.  All voted in the affirmative.
